about.summary: Convert plot function call (using expression or formula) to 'grob' or 'ggplot' object that compatible to the 'grid' and 'ggplot2' ecosystem. With this package, we are able to e.g. using 'cowplot' to align plots produced by 'base' graphics, 'grid', 'lattice', 'vcd' etc. by converting them to 'ggplot' objects.

name: r-ggplotify
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.0.4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}
{% set cran_mirror = 'https://cran.r-project.org' %}

package:
  name: r-ggplotify
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: ggplotify_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggplotify_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggplotify/ggplotify_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8f49abd0dbda0c3fde330cdb315e2b4482712558f6d13e6ae2bc30db6be3635b

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-gridgraphics
    - r-rvcheck
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-gridgraphics
    - r-rvcheck

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggplotify')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggplotify')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/GuangchuangYu/ggplotify
  license: Artistic-2.0
  summary: Convert plot function call (using expression or formula) to 'grob' or 'ggplot' object
    that compatible to the 'grid' and 'ggplot2' ecosystem. With this package, we are
    able to e.g. using 'cowplot' to align plots produced by 'base' graphics, 'grid',
    'lattice', 'vcd' etc. by converting them to 'ggplot' objects.
  license_family: OTHER

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - nick-youngblut
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
    - daler
    - jdblischak
    - cbrueffer
